General.Name: KT Hitel Corporation. Limited
General.Description: KT Hitel Corporation., Limited engages in the content distribution, T-commerce, and ICT platform businesses in South Korea. It offers digital content distribution rights to new media platforms, such as IPTV, cable, Internet, and mobile; and K Shopping, a two-way data TV shopping service, as well as ICT solutions and services. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. KT Hitel Corporation., Limited is a subsidiary of KT Corporation.
